Aka

2023 | 2h 29m | Action

A steely special ops agent finds his morality put to the test when he infiltrates a crime syndicate and unexpectedly bonds with the boss' young son.

Starring: Alban Lenoir,Éric Cantona,Thibault de Montalembert

Watch all you want.

AKA | Official Trailer | Netflix

A steely special ops agent finds himself in a moral crisis when he infiltrates a crime syndicate and unexpectedly bonds with the boss's son. Alban Lenoir stars alongside footballer-turned-actor Éric Cantona in this emotionally-charged action thriller.
